name: Fivebyfivia Delenda Est
description:
Fivebyfivia is the result of combining two things I like: text adventures and a certain board game you'll be able to guess pretty quickly. It was written for the 2021 ParserComp.

The standalone version probably works better. WinFrotz should work with it.

I'm not proficient with web programming, but I will try to get the web versionn right.

SHORT DEVLOG:

1.0.1: fixed erroneous debug text in a header file, cover art in ZBLORB file, and issues with the Parchment template (A mistaken reinstall of the Inform IDE killed my previous web browser)
